DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the brain TSPO occupancy of ONO-2952 in healthy adult subjects after a single dose using [11C]PBR28 as a specific PET ligand for TSPO. The secondary objective is to evaluate the relationship between TSPO occupancy and the plasma concentration of ONO-2952 and to investigate the safety and tolerability of ONO-2952 in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: ONO-2952 Single-dose PET Study in Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy nonsmoking male or female subjects (1855 inclusive) Body mass index (BMI) of 1935 kg/m2 (inclusive) For females, surgically sterilized, postmenopausal, or who are non lactating and agree to use a double barrier method of contraception History or presence of clinically significant disease
